title: Status 500

labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

body:

<!-- I tried to add a new user in doccano, in a given project and now I can't see any project -->

<!--
And whenever I'm soon having a Status 500 error. I think it is linked to the user but. The problem is that within the user with the problem I have enough project and data recorded. I need to recover this data inside the doccano, please help-->
